ygData.subject: Re: Rant and Ramble
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Welp, I was GOING to write to tell you about how you could train in the Freeport sewers, but yuo found that out already. Couple o other things for you,
ygData.messageBody:
> This list is VERY quiet. Make some noise people!!!!
> I don't care what you send. Just send something. :)

Welp, I was GOING to write to tell you about how you could train in the
Freeport sewers, but yuo found that out already.

Couple 'o other things for you, though -- Spore Guardian. This is an
extremely rare spawn. In al the time I've played I've heard of him appearing
ONCE. (I'm sure it has happened plenty more than that, but I heard it happen
merely once). He appears in a line straight out or so from Guk. Don't know
what level he is.

The troll in the OOT ... he's lvl 20. So don't bother to try him yet. Also,
be sure to get off the boat on the way BACK from Butcherblock, not on the
way. The rocks are different rocks (as I found out to my dismay when I leapt
off the boat). He isn't too tough for a lvl 20, though.

Dwarves --- kill lots and lots of goblins. I've killed lots of dwarves,
though, so I don't think I can ever get into Dwarf town, or Rivervale,
either, since I have killed millions upon millions of halflings. Muhahahar.
:)

Until Norrath,
Virten
